amendment.description: An amendment numbered 72 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase funding for the veterans treatment courts program by $ 1,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Golden.
